mapper.select: SELECT FR. * , NVL(F.F_SVNAME,0) AS FF_SVNAME, M. * FROM FREE FR, FILE_T F, MEMBER M WHERE F.F_TABLE(+) = 'F' AND F.F_MAIN_YN(+) ='Y' AND FR.FR_DEL_YN(+) = 'N' AND FR.M_IDX = M.M_IDX AND F.F_ARTICLE(+) =FR.FR_IDX AND FR_CATEGORY = #{MO_CATEGORY} ORDER BY FR.FR_REGDATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(Z.Z_ARTICLE) AS FRZ_COUNT FROM ZZIM Z, FREE F WHERE Z.Z_TABLE = 'F' AND Z.Z_ARTICLE = F.FR_IDX AND F.FR_IDX = #{FR_IDX}
SELECT COUNT(Z_IDX) AS FZ_CHECK FROM ZZIM Z, FREE FR, MEMBER M WHERE Z.M_IDX = M.M_IDX AND FR.FR_IDX = Z.Z_ARTICLE AND Z.Z_TABLE = 'F' AND FR.FR_IDX = #{FR_IDX} AND M.M_IDX = #{M_IDX}
SELECT NVL(F.F_SVNAME,0) AS PROFILE FROM MEMBER M, FILE_T F WHERE F.F_TABLE(+) = 'P' AND F.F_ARTICLE(+) = M.M_IDX AND M.M_IDX = #{M_IDX}
SELECT FR.*, NVL2(F.F_SVNAME,1,0) AS F_SVNAME FROM FREE FR, FILE_T F WHERE FR.FR_IDX = #{FR_IDX} AND F.F_ARTICLE(+) = FR.FR_IDX AND FR_DEL_YN = 'N' AND F.F_TABLE(+) = 'F'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE (FR_IDX, M_IDX, FR_TITLE, FR_CONTENT, FR_CATEGORY, FR_REGDATE, RE_MOD_YN, FR_DEL_YN, FR_WRITER, FR_COUNT) VALUES (FR_IDX.nextval, #{M_IDX}, #{FR_TITLE}, #{FR_CONTENT}, #{FR_CATEGORY}, sysdate, 'N', 'N', #{FR_WRITER}, 0)

INSERT INTO FREE (F_IDX, F_TABLE, F_ARTICLE, F_OGNAME, F_SVNAME, F_SIZE, F_MAIN_YN, F_DEL_YN, F_REG_DATE) VALUES (F_IDX.nextval, 'F', #{F_ARTICLE}, #{F_OGNAME}, #{F_SVNAME}, #{F_SIZE}, 'N', 'N', sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE FILE_T SET F_OGNAME = #{F_OGNAME}, F_SVNAME = #{F_SVNAME}, F_SIZE = #{F_SIZE}, F_MAIN_YN = #{F_MAIN_YN}, F_REG_DATE = sysdate WHERE F_IDX = #{F_IDX} AND F_TABLE = #{F_TABLE}
UPDATE FREE SET FR_TITLE = #{FR_TITLE}, FR_CONTENT = #{FR_CONTENT}, RE_MOD_YN = 'Y', FR_REGDATE = sysdate WHERE FR_IDX = #{FR_IDX} AND M_IDX = #{M_IDX}
UPDATE FREE SET FR_DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE FR_IDX = #{FR_IDX} AND M_IDX = #{M_IDX}
UPDATE FILE_T SET F_DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE F_TABLE = 'F' F_ARTICLE = #{F_ARTICLE}
